basics.name: Jeremy Brown
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Methodical and solution-focused Chief Software Architect with 23+ years of full-stack software engineering experience. Expert in the software development lifecycle with a proven history of developing backend services and user interfaces for desktop and web. Proficient in .NET, C#, and AWS/Azure to create scalable and high-performing solutions.

work.name: Mouri Tech (contracted to OneStream Software)
work.summary: Developing enterprise software solutions for OneStream Software as a contractor through Mouri Tech.

work.name: Acre Security (previously Open Options)
work.summary: Led architecture and development of multiple enterprise-grade access control and integration platforms.
highlights: Designed and developed Flex API v2 (ASP.NET Core 7, EF Core, Blazor, IdentityServer4, MQTT, Swagger, DevExpress).
Created Flex API v1 (.NET 4.5, XML-RPC, Telerik OpenAccess ORM) with over 2000 deployments and 500+ API licenses.
Built FusionX Blazor WebAssembly PWA frontend.
Developed Flex MQTT broker for real-time events and alarms.
Engineered Flex Tunnel (Cloudflare Argo Tunnel wrapper) for secure hybrid cloud access.
Created Flex Proxy (Microsoft YARP wrapper) for Docker deployments.
Developed numerous supporting tools: diagnostics, offline lock apps, COM integrations, licensing systems, and video relay services.

work.name: Paperless Transactions
work.summary: Developed online donation and payment processing platform for churches.
highlights: Ensured PCI compliance and supported PEN testing

projects.name: Flex API v2
projects.description: Complete rewrite of Flex API using ASP.NET Core 7.0 with modular architecture, Blazor frontend, IdentityServer4 authentication, MQTT broker, reporting, and hybrid cloud tunneling.

projects.name: Flex API v1
projects.description: Original Flex API enabling third-party integrations into access control systems. Widely deployed with extensive developer support and NuGet packages.

projects.name: Misc. C# Projects
projects.description: Diagnostics tools, COM integrations for HID/Schlage devices, offline lock applications, Axis A1001 integration, licensing website.

projects.name: Misc. Delphi Projects
projects.description: Legacy Delphi applications including badging system, visitor management, and licensing scheme.
